'''14w18b''' is the twenty-first [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on May 2, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140425132002/https://mojang.com/2014/04/minecraft-snapshot-14w18a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w18b|date=April 30, 2014|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in [[14w18a]].

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Endermen]] and [[endermite]]s'''
* No longer attack each other.
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Slime block]]s'''
* Are no longer bouncy when sneaking.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=14w18b|prefix=Minecraft
|;dev
|48899|TNT produces damage when triggered in water.
|51168| Downward-facing droppers and dispensers only shoot items west.
|;prev
|54008|Minecraft crashes when loading the world with item frames/placing item frames.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 14w18b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time but was added back in September 2018.
